channel.title: Zenith Scape Charm Drop Rates
channel.description:
Hey,
So I'm using a Zenith Scape source, and I've noticed that every NPC drops like 10+ of a charm, nearly 100% of the time.
My question is, how do I minimize the drop rate and drop amount? I've tried using a Drop Editor but the charms don't even show up under the drops for the NPC?
Thanks.

item.title: Zenith Scape Charm Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

David321:

That thingy is not added in each of npcs, its on one file and i guess you gotta search on Eclipse Sdk for that, im not coding 667 so cant tell what file it was , and actually yes found once it on one file it will show id or name Charms and something like drop rate 1-80 or something, just search and ur done.

Oo alright, I’ll take a look around. Thanks bro.

Read full topic

item.title: Zenith Scape Charm Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

[quote=“xplode, post:4, topic:459670”][quote author=TeeBark link=topic=562578.msg4101840#msg4101840 date=1347580488]

What revision exactly is nenith?

667/721.
[/quote]

728* if you downloaded his recent one. and which drop editor did you use? because the one i use works perfectly fine.[/quote]

I didn’t, so 721.

And I use the drop editor that came with the 721, and added a run cmd for it…

Read full topic
